title: Neapolitan shortbread
ingredients: ['225g butter, softened', '300g granulated sugar', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '310g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon almond extract', '5 drops red food colouring', '30g baking chocolate, melted', '60g chopped walnuts']
